articles.description: Cisco layoffs loom as well as a reduction in the company’s real estate footprint as Cisco seeks to “right size” some of its business units, including Cisco Collaboration, Cisco’s CEO and CFO said during the company’s Q1 2023 earnings call.
articles.content:
Networking News 
Cisco says it will be addressing the headcount reduction Thursday with its employees. The tech giant also plans to shrink its real estate footprint of smaller office locations, exec… [+2894 chars]

articles.author: Ken Fisher
articles.title: 2022 midterm results disappointed GOP — but were good for stocks - New York Post
articles.description: Since 1925, the nine months starting Oct. 1 in a midterm election year and extending into the first half of the following year saw the S&P 500 go negative just twice.
articles.content:
It was a disappointing election season for Republicans, but it was great for stocks — with the Dow up more than 1,100 points since last Tuesday’s poll results. 
This shouldn’t have been a surprise. … [+3859 chars]

articles.title: THIS Made-in-India smallest and most affordable electric car is priced at only Rs 4.79 lakh: IN PICS - Zee News
articles.description: The Mumbai-based EV company PMV Electric today introduced EaS-E in India, with a pricing of Rs 4.79 lakh (ex-showroom) (ex-showroom). The most affordable electric car on the Indian market is the companys flagship model.

articles.author: Lokesh Choudhary
articles.title: The Rise of Indian WITCH and the Fall of US FAANG - Analytics India Magazine
articles.description: While FAANG companies are trying too hard to minimise the costs by implementing harsh cost-cutting measures, it’d be interesting to see what direction Indian IT companies ultimately take to tackle the worsening economic situation.
